meanings.definition: A small, round, flat cake made of oatmeal or barley meal.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a tasty dornock for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother bakes delicious dornocks every Sunday.
meanings.sent3: The dornock rolled off the plate and onto the floor, much to the dog's delight.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a freshly baked dornock.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the dornock filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A small, round, flat cake made of oatmeal or barley meal, typically fried.
meanings.sent1: The sizzle of the dornock in the pan signaled it was ready to eat.
meanings.sent2: At the fair, we indulged in crispy dornocks with powdered sugar on top.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally flipped the dornock onto the ceiling, causing a sticky situation.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like the oil around the dornock in the frying pan.
meanings.sent5: The golden-brown color of the dornock was a perfect indication of its deliciousness.
